description: Old-school software instruments: synthv1, a polyphonic subtractive synthesizer; samplv1, a polyphonic sampler synthesizer; drumkv1, yet another drum-kit sampler; padthv1, a polyphonic additive synthesizer.

name: VidCutter
description: Fast lossless media cutter + joiner w/ frame-accurate SmartCut options powered by mpv, FFmpeg via a sleek Qt5 GUI.

name: Video Trimmer
description: Cut out a fragment of a video given the start and end timestamps. The video is never re-encoded, so the process is very fast and does not reduce the video quality.

name: Viewnior
description: Minimalistic GTK image viewer featuring support for flipping, rotating, animations and configurable mouse actions.

name: Vimiv
description: An image viewer with vim-like keybindings. It is written in python3 using the Gtk3 toolkit.

name: Vimiv (Qt port)
description: An image viewer with vim-like keybindings. It is written in python3 and PyQt5.

name: VLC media player
description: Middleweight video player with support for a wide variety of audio and video formats.

name: VMPK
description: Virtual MIDI Piano Keyboard. MIDI events generator and receiver. It can use midi SoundFonts to generate sound by itself, or can be used to drive a MIDI synthesizer.

name: Volume Icon
description: Another volume control for your system tray with channel selection, themes and an external mixer.

name: Webcamoid
description: Full featured webcam suite.

name: Wings 3D
description: Advanced subdivision modeler that is both powerful and easy to use.

name: xcolor
description: Lightweight color picker for X11.

name: xine
description: Free multimedia player.

name: Xjadeo
description: Video player that displays a video-clip in sync with an external time source (MTC, LTC, JACK-transport).

name: XMMS2
description: Complete rewrite of the popular music player.

name: xwax
description: Digital Vinyl System (DVS) for Linux. It allows DJs and turntablists to playback digital audio files (MP3, Ogg Vorbis, FLAC, AAC and more), controlled using a normal pair of turntables via timecoded vinyls.

name: Yoshimi
description: Software synthesizer, a fork of ZynAddSubFX.

name: YouTube Music
description: Electron-based wrapper around YouTube Music with built in addons.

name: zopflipng
description: Highly efficient PNG optimisation tool using Google's zopfli library

name: Zrythm
description: A feature-rich digital audio workstation with support for various plugin formats and advanced audio processing capabilities.

name: ZynAddSubFX
description: Fully featured software synthesizer capable of making a countless number of instruments, from some common heard from expensive hardware to interesting sounds that you will boost to an amazing universe of sounds.
